channel.title: Need Help Creating Super Donor

item.title: Need Help Creating Super Donor
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:2, topic:424103”]thats because you have to add in super donor. you can’t just add a command and hope that super donor will be there. You have to go into your Player.java
Could be either playerassistant.java or player.java, but you gotta declare that when c2.isDonor = 2
That it makes them a super donor, and can have more access to things :p[/quote]
my command is stating, c.donator = 2, it gives 2, and i state within commands ect that c.donator = 2, but the command doesnt even give 2, it does nothing idk y

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Creating Super Donor
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

thats because you have to add in super donor. you can’t just add a command and hope that super donor will be there. You have to go into your Player.java
Could be either playerassistant.java or player.java, but you gotta declare that when c2.isDonor = 2
That it makes them a super donor, and can have more access to things

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Creating Super Donor
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

Iv added a command: [code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“givesuper”)) {
try {
String playerToMod = playerCommand.substring(10);
for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToMod)) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
c2.sendMessage("You have been given donator status by " + c.playerName);
c2.playerRights = 4;
c2.isDonator = 2;
c2.logout();

							break;
						} 
					}
				}[/code]

but when i do this command in game, it doesnt give the player donator 2? which will be super donator

Read full topic
